The material of the black ones felt almost like tissue paper and the pockets stuck out awkwardly - I’ll be returning them. The blue ones were obviously worn and returned, since I found a used tissue in one of the pockets when trying them on. Yuck. But I’m going to keep them and will wear after I wash them. They are very lightweight and flowy, and the fabric is pretty thin but softer than the black ones. Not sure how they’ll hold up after a wash, but I plan to hand wash and air dry them to lessen the risk of them ripping or shrinking.

评论概述: Great Pants for Casual or Dressy Wear
评论详情: These were an impulse buy after having bought a pair of similar ones on vacation. These are a nice soft fabric and can be dressed up (with high heels and a dressy blouse) or down (with flat sandals and a casual top) depending on need. While I bought a size medium which fits close to "true to size", time will tell whether washing causes them to shrink. If you like a little more room, recommend you compare your measurements to the size chart and buy one size up from what the chart indicates will fit you. The waist measurements for Medium and Large overlap quite a bit, so you may have to compare your hip measurement to see which will give you the fit you want. Keep in mind the waist will look small when you first open the package and unfold them, but it is very stretchy.

I love these. I sized up because I find that these pants shrink a bit, but the fabric is great and these are so comfortable. They've also held up well in a handful of washes! Also ... pockets, functional pockets!

Comfortable, nice looking, looks GREAT with a stretchy, dressy top, dressy heels, and a fleece vest. It can also look great as casual pants, with a crop top and sandals.  Very versatile!  Fabric is thin, but not see through, so good for summer wear.  I’m using mine at a dressy fall indoor event.  It says hand wash  only, but placed in a mesh zip bag and washed in cold water and hung to dry should work just fine!  Definitely worth getting more than one fabric design for the price!

I bought a pair for myself 43. my oldest daughter 25, and my youngest daughter 12. And we all love them equally! Super cute!

I absolutely love these pants. They are super cute, they are really comfortable, and are lightweight. They aren't too hot to wear during the summer, and they're soft and flowy. Every single time I wear these pants, complete strangers stop me to tell me how much they like them, and to ask where I got them. I love these pants so much, they are absolutely my favorite. I wear them constantly because I have a shirt that matches every single color printed on them. I'm not kidding when I say I get  complimented every time I wear them, and that they go with literally every top and pair of shoes I own. I wear them around the house as sweatpants, and out as a cute dressy outfit. 100% recommend, and I will definitely be buying more.

These have quickly become my go-to pants for hanging around the house/neighborhood in warmer months. I did go up one size because I'm taller (5'10") and wanted them to be both baggy and long enough. This worked out well -- they fit great! I especially love the smocked waist. I carry most of my weight in my butt/thighs, so your mileage may vary, but the waist in these pants hugs my tummy well enough that the pants stay up without digging into my abdomen and being uncomfortable. Also, no bulky or annoying drawstring tie.  I've washed them about a dozen times so far on cold and hung them to dry. No shrinkage or significant wrinkling.  The fabric is lightweight enough that I think they could be somewhat see-through in a lighter, solid color. However, with darker colors/fun patterns, that is not the case (I've asked friends to check in full sunlight, and they report no see-through issues).  I loved my first pair so much that I've since ordered two more pairs so that I can live in them all summer long!

I cannot say enough good things about these pants. They are so comfortable, so cute on, very slimming, love love love the pockets. I can throw them in the wash and dryer with no issues! I will be getting more colors asap!

They were cute, but the material was a problem. It's some sort of cheap synthetic material that collects static charge with every step. I never wore them outside the house as I thought the material would be easily damaged just by sitting on the wrong surface. I bought these hippie pants for a concert in Colorado. They’re exactly what I was looking for! Super Comfortable. Perfect length. Pockets. Great color. What more can you ask for! I’m 5’4 weight 154, I got a medium.

I absolutely love these pants. So much that I just ordered 2 more pairs in different colors. I literally just want to live in them! I wear a 12-14 and bought the XL. They're very loose and flowy.
